short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your Facebook sanity! Make those political crybabies show their true faces!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of all of those whiney political posters on Facebook? Now you can make them show their true faces! 

After installing, you can click on the crybaby icon in a user's comment and their profile picture will change to a random image of a crying baby. You can manage your crybabies by clicking on the crybaby icon in the address bar.

Note: Their profile picture only changes on your browser. So, only you see them as a crybaby (perhaps this is political commentary).
